ygData.subject: Re: Bummed out.. :(
ygData.msgSnippet: Man that sucks ! 8( I am more or less in the same boat, although I did not actually put an order in until the 28th - I was living under the delusion that the
ygData.messageBody:
Man that sucks ! 8(

I am more or less in the same boat, although I did not actually put an order
in until the 28th - I was living under the delusion that the australian
distributor might actually SELL this game in australia 8(.

On the brighter side though, Outpost actually finally cleared their
backorder
and shipped my copy so I should get it in a couple of days..

Ebworld was putting up new adds for it so I assume they also got a shipment
of them - maybe you will receive yours sooner than you thought ! 8)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Avron Vallengard [mailto:avron@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 9:19 PM
> To: EverQuest
> Subject: [EverQuest] Bummed out.. :(
>
>
> From: Avron Vallengard <avron@...>
>
>
> Like the subject of this message says, I am quite bummed out, by the mere
> fact that I have yet to receive a copy of the game. I live in sweden and
> preordered the game about one week before the end of beta phase 4, now I
> have ordered it from 4 places both domestic(one being the largest comp.
> game distributor in sweden) and foreign. But I still haven't received the
> game. Now I am active reader on eqvault as well as participate in mailing
> lists, and this is REALLY annoying. Let's just say I've had some extra
> time thinking about what class/race I will play.. And if I don't get the
> game within 2 weeks from now I'm gonna give up and buy Ultima or
> something, but then again, I would have to kill myself.. :p
>
> - Avron - Totally BUMMED right now! :(
>
>
>
